name: Hilltop Raider
description:
Your spacecraft is damaged and cannot go beyond orbit. The new engine is very expensive, so you have to explore the hilly planet you're stuck on, and find something of value to cover the costs.

You will have to run a lot with your feet in this game, but at the end you will definitely ride with the breeze!

Left / Right arrows: WalkUp arrow: JumpDown arrow: Dig (when available)X: Use axeZ: Cast fireball (when available)

The progress bar at the top of the screen shows the player's location in the world.

Made for LOWREZJAM 2022

Ikkle-4 font by JackOatley
